org.lafayette.server.core.config

Class UnixStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lafayette.server.core.config.UnixStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoaderStrategie

     class UnixStrategy
extends Object
implements LoaderStrategie
    Strategy to find configuration file.
    1. look for $HOME/.lafayette/server.properties
    2. look for /etc/lafayette/server.properties
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

      Logging facility.

      USed as directory name.

      • LOG

        private static final Logger LOG
        Logging facility.

      • fileList

        private final List<String> fileList
        List of files to search for a configuration. The files are checked in the order they were added to the list. First found file wins.

      • foundConfig

        private File foundConfig
        The found configuration.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnixStrategy

        public UnixStrategy(String home)
        Initializes prefix with empty string.
        Parameters:
        home - where the users home directory is

      • UnixStrategy

        public UnixStrategy(String home,
            String prefix)
        Dedicated constructor. Initializes the list of files to look for a configuration.
        Parameters:
        home - where the users home directory is
        prefix - used to prefix the system configuration directory, e.g. they reside in /foo/bar/etc instead of /etc

    • Method Detail

      • createHomeConfigFileName

        public static String createHomeConfigFileName(String home)
        Helper to create the home configuration file name. The pattern is: home + "/." + VENDOR + DIR_SEP + FILE
        Parameters:
        home - the home directory. Must not be empty or null
        Returns:
        generated file name string

      • createSystemConfigFileName

        public static String createSystemConfigFileName(String prefix)
        Helper to create the system configuration file name. The pattern is prefix + DIR_SEP + SYSTEM_CONFIG_DIR + DIR_SEP + VENDOR + DIR_SEP + FILE.
        Parameters:
        prefix - may be empty or null
        Returns:
        generated file name string

      • hasFoundConfig

        public boolean hasFoundConfig()
        Description copied from interface: LoaderStrategie
        Whether the loader has found a configuration file or not. Call this method after LoaderStrategie.findConfig() to check if there is a file available.
        Specified by:
        hasFoundConfig in interface LoaderStrategie
        Returns:
        true if the strategy has found a configuration, else false

      • getFoundConfig

        public File getFoundConfig()
        Description copied from interface: LoaderStrategie
        Get the found configuration file.
        Specified by:
        getFoundConfig in interface LoaderStrategie
        Returns:
        may return null

      • findConfig

        public void findConfig()
        Description copied from interface: LoaderStrategie
        Starts the search strategy to find a configuration file.
        Specified by:
        findConfig in interface LoaderStrategie

        Collection<String> getFileList()
        Get collection of files to look for a configuration.
        Returns:
